types:type.name: json
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type json = {| resourceType: String, address: Array<{| city: String, country: String, line: Array<String>, postalCode: String, state: String |}>, birthDate: String, careProvider: Array<{| reference: String |}>, gender: String, name: Array<{| use: String, family: Array<String>, given: Array<String> |}>, telecom: Array<{| system: String, use: String, value: String |}> |} {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "{\"resourceType\":\"Patient\",\"address\":[{\"city\":\"San Francisco\",\"country\":\"United States of America\",\"line\":[\"499 Folsom Street\"],\"postalCode\":\"90354\",\"state\":\"California\"}],\"birthDate\":\"1970-02-12\",\"careProvider\":[{\"reference\":\"Practitioner\/1\"}],\"gender\":\"male\",\"name\":[{\"use\":\"official\",\"family\":[\"Radonctest\"],\"given\":[\"Veera\"]}],\"telecom\":[{\"system\":\"phone\",\"use\":\"home\",\"value\":\"608-999-9005\"}]}"}
